Posts.Content: Hello everybody, I am part of a group that runs a convention for the toy My Little Pony. Every year we hold fundraisers for Charity. One of those fundraisers this year is a raffle for Custom My Little Ponies. We will be donating every penny from this raffle to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation. More then one of the team members for our event has been affected by breast cancer including myself. We are doing everything we can to spread the word on this raffle. Please visit the site at http://www.mlpfair.com/braffle/ http://www.mlpfair.com/braffle/smallpromise.jpg http://www.mlpfair.com/braffle/group-shot.jpg You can see more pictures of these girls at the site. You can also visit the Convention site at http://www.mylittleponyfair.com This is a once yearly event dedicated to this charming and sweet toy. Thank you all for your time if anyone can help pass the word along on this raffle we would very much appreciate it.
Posts.Title: My Little Pony Custom Raffle for Breast Cancer Research
